default_params.prompt: The person is dancing, realistic video.

schedule.comment: Time format: HH:MM (24-hour format). Leave empty to start immediately

tasks.prompt: Replace the cheerleading team member performing the 'Piki Piki Dance' on the side of a baseball field with the person in the provided reference photo. The new person should wear the original clothing and replicate all dance movements, maintaining pose, lighting, and integration with the existing field and background elements.

comments.folder_structure: Each task folder should have 'Source Image' and 'Source Video' subfolders. All images will be cross-matched with all videos (e.g., 4 images Ã— 5 videos = 20 total generations).
comments.animation_mode: Either 'move' or 'mix'. Controls the animation generation mode.
comments.num_outputs: Number of output variations to generate (typically 2).
comments.seed: Random seed for generation. Use '-1' for random seed.
comments.cross_matching: The system automatically cross-matches all images in 'Source Image' folder with all videos in 'Source Video' folder.
comments.output_group_tasks_by: Set to 0 (or omit) to create one report with all tasks. Set to N (e.g., 3) to group N tasks into one combined report. Example: with 5 tasks and group_tasks_by=2, creates 3 reports (2+2+1).
